citations.narrative:
The rabbit cages had an accumulation of old hair and feces at the back of the cages. Primary enclosures shall be kept
reasonably free of excreta, hair, and other debris. Inadequate cleaning can cause illness and disease in the animals. The
rabbit cages housing the 3 rabbits need to be cleaned more frequently.
To be corrected by: Oct 1, 2023

Several of the chain link fences were curling up at the bottom and/or bowing out from the animals rubbing against them.
Some areas had loose wires with sharp points. Legs could become trapped in the bowing wire or the animals could be
injured from the sharp points. The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the
animals involved. The facilities shall be structurally sound and maintained in good repair.
To be corrected by: Nov 1, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
The rabbit cages had an accumulation of old hair and feces at the back of the cages. Primary enclosures shall be kept 
reasonably free of excreta, hair, and other debris. Inadequate cleaning can cause illness and disease in the animals. The 
rabbit cages housing the 3 rabbits need to be cleaned more frequently. 
To be corrected by: Oct 1, 2023 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Several of the chain link fences were curling up at the bottom and/or bowing out from the animals rubbing against them. 
Some areas had loose wires with sharp points. Legs could become trapped in the bowing wire or the animals could be 
injured from the sharp points. The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the 
animals involved. The facilities shall be structurally sound and maintained in good repair.  
To be corrected by: Nov 1, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
